Hire an Esquire | UX/UI Designer | Pittsburgh, PA, USA | Full time, ONSITE

We’re rounding out our product team by searching for an ambitious and detail-oriented UX/UI designer to join our product team in Pittsburgh, PA. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in responsive web application design and will be tasked with creating new and improving existing user workflows as we continue building out our product. We’re looking for somebody who has experience delivering both UX and UI designs, with a strong emphasis on responsive design and user-testing.

Hire an Esquire is a Legal Labor Marketplace / Vertical SaaS transforming legal freelance, hiring and recruiting by automating and updating an outdated process. We're a lean, energetic startup team with offices in NYC, Pittsburgh, San Francisco, Philadelphia, and San Antonio.

Apply at http://hireanesquireteam.applytojob.com/apply/TaTDoqgz2t/UXU... (be sure to mention HN)
